overview: Our first step in thinking of a way to be together The Korean-Chinese of our people in China. Currently, 2 million people live in China, of which 1 million live in Yanbian Korean Autonomous Region. Also, the majority of Korean-Chinese are staying in Korea for various reasons. They live to earn money, to study, and to get married and have a family. But we don't know much about them. Therefore, social problems may arise as a result of indifference or looking at them with a narrow-minded gaze.
title: Korean People and Korean Chinese
